senses.sense_definition: A system of exercises, breathing techniques, and meditation practiced to promote control of the body and mind, often for health and relaxation.

examples.text: She attends a <w>yoga</w> class every Tuesday to improve her flexibility.
You will need a comfortable mat if you want to practice <w>yoga</w> at home.

senses.sense_definition: The tree Elaeocarpus joga, native to the Pacific islands.

examples.text: The botanist identified the rare insect on the leaves of the <w>yoga</w>.
Local traditions sometimes involve using wood from the <w>yoga</w> tree.

senses.sense_definition: One of the six orthodox schools of Hindu philosophy.

examples.text: The ancient texts of <w>Yoga</w> provide a path toward spiritual enlightenment.
Scholars debate the historical origins of the <w>Yoga</w> school of thought.
